devdoc.details: Wrappers around ERC20 operations that returns the value received by recipent and the actual allowance of approval. To use this library you can add a `using TransferHelper for IERC20;` statement to your contract, which allows you to call the safe operations as `token.safeTransfer(...)`, etc.
devdoc.title: TransferHelper
